name: Hoshi no Oka Gakuen Monogatari: Gakuensai
overview: Hoshi no Oka Gakuen Monogatari: Gakuensai is a dating simulation game in which the player takes the role of a young student (Kazuya Murata) that will have to prepare the forthcoming festival that is some months ahead. The purpose of the game is up to the success of the festival, you make friends with other students through academic preparation and life of the protagonist. The game displays a map of the school and the player have to go to different places of the school and come to talk to the teachers and friends to see different event. The player's character is displayed in the map and also the different characters appear there. At the end of the day the player can check how is his relations with all the different characters. Each day you work with each club and with the main characters, and depending of the choices that will increase or decrese the degree of completion. Work or help the main characters, items efficiency by passing the club wants to go bankrupt. Get better stats and relations by helping the members of staff to work. The game features japanese voice acting for all the characters.
